H0.text: What part of the human body is affected by 'iritis'. Brain

H1.text: What part of the human body is affected by 'iritis'. Liver

H2.text: What part of the human body is affected by 'iritis'. Skin

H3.text: What part of the human body is affected by 'iritis'. Eye

A4.text: Iritis is the inflammation of the anterior chamber and iris.
